attributes.action: Ban all teachings that condone breaking the laws of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background:
There are people from non-Western cultures who have chosen to live in the United Kingdom. Their cultures can conflict with our own. We need to make clear that breaking UK laws will not be tolerated.
UK laws should be made clear to all individuals, young, old, at home, at work and at school.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
